system.effect: Can make -10 Tech-Use Test to change hull colours, markings, registry markings, name, and distinctive patterns in order to try and disguise itself. Can't change shape though. Programming in additional patterns requires -20 Tech-Use Test. Component cannot be damaged or destroyed except via a critical hit. One per Vessel.
